page.title: 10EDUCATION IN CHILDWALL
page.content:
The area is served by five{PRIMARY {SCHOOLS,}three{SECONDARY SCHOOLS}and two{COLLEGES OF FURTHER EDUCATION.
For the primary sector{KING DAVID {HEBREW SCHOOL}serves the Jewish community,{CHILDWALL C.of E.}is a Church of England school,{RUDSTON ROAD is a county primary school, and{BISHOP {EATON}is Roman Catholic school.{ {BEECHENHURST}is a private preparatory school. In the secondary sector,{CHILDWALL {COMMUNITY SCHOOL}is a comprehensive school,{KING DAVID HEBREW BI-LATERAL {SCHOOL}is Jewish and{ST.FRANCIS XAVIER {HIGH SCHOOL}is Roman Catholic. { S. KATHERINES C.of E.COLLEGE}and{ {CHRIST'S AND NOTRE DAME R.C.COLLEGE jointly form the{LIVERPOOL INSTITUTE {of HIGHER EDUCATION.}
